Thomas Manson wrote:
> 
> No i didn't use WASD  junit... that's probably the reason of this conflict.
> I use text mode.  All the more, I'm using a JNI interface (Staffware
> API) that is not reloadable...

If you depend on a third-party library that is not reloadable, then you 
should stay with just the text-based test runner. I recommend running 
those tests separately from the rest, and using Ant.

Good luck.
--
